overview: In the film, 槑舄 (pronunciation: no drama) is a smug pilot. He lives in distress, but he will make fun of it. It reflects the lifestyle of men and women in modern cities. Although the appearance is beautiful, the hardship is only oneself. Understand, and all efforts are to live up to their own. In the world of illusory papers, people can easily lose themselves, and those who are really down-to-earth and work hard will understand the true meaning of life.
title: DaiDai Bird
